sentences.en: Courage and insight, action, motion are flinty , arrogant, sharp, fight.
sentences.cn: 胆识 、 行动 、 运动、强硬 、 霸气 、 尖锐 、 争斗.

sentences.en: EXAMPLE : The flinty old accountant in our company never smiles.
sentences.cn: 我们公司冷漠的老会计从来不笑.

sentences.en: Flinty Miss Manners does not recognize any holidays from etiquette.
sentences.cn: 严肃的礼仪小姐可是从来不休假的.

sentences.en: He looks like he could piss ice water . He appraises the newcomers with flinty eyes.
sentences.cn: 他看起来冷若冰霜,用冷酷的眼神打量着新犯.

sentences.en: He nourished him with honey from the rock, and with oil from the flinty crag.
sentences.cn: 又使他从磐石中咂蜜,从坚石中吸油.

sentences.en: Our urban land utilization faces flinty surroundings which are rare in other country in the world.
sentences.cn: 我国的城市土地利用面临着世界上少有的严峻环境.

sentences.en: So , further improving the regulation of land expropriation is very much demanding facing such flinty conditions.
sentences.cn: 面对如此严峻的形势, 进一步完善土地征收立法已经势在必行.

words.tran_cn: 燧石；打火石；极硬的东西
坚硬的；燧石似的；坚定不移的

trans.tran_cn: 燧石的，燧石构成的，燧石似的，坚硬的
